content: ðŸ“‚Â Guides â†’ Airnode  Monorepo Examples [#] (#frontmatter-title)  ===  There are examples of various Airnode functionality in the [airnode-examples package] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples) âžš of the Airnode monorepo: --- [authenticated-coinmarketcap] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/blob/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/authenticated-coinmarketcap) âžš - cryptocurrency price request using [authentication] (./../guides/build-an-airnode/api-security.html#airnode-authentication-security-schemes) . --- [coingecko] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/blob/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/coingecko) âžš - unauthenticated cryptocurrency price request. --- [coingecko-post-processing] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/coingecko-post-processing) âžš - demonstration of the [post-processing] (./../../../../ois/v1.2/processing.html) feature. --- [coingecko-pre-processing] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/coingecko-pre-processing) âžš - demonstration of the [pre-processing] (./../../../../ois/v1.2/processing.html) feature. --- [coingecko-signed-data] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/coingecko-signed-data) âžš - demonstration of [signed data] (./../guides/build-an-airnode/http-gateways.html) retrieval for beacon updates. --- [coingecko-template] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/coingecko-template) âžš - demonstration of [template] (./../../grp-developers/using-templates.html) requests. --- [coingecko-testable] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/coingecko-testable) âžš - demonstration of how to test the endpoint using the [HTTP gateway] (./../guides/build-an-airnode/http-gateways.html) . --- [failing-example] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/failing-example) âžš - demonstration of Airnode error handling through an invalid request. --- [relay-security-schemes] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/relay-security-schemes) - demonstration of how to [relay multiple request metadata] (./../guides/build-an-airnode/api-security.html#relayed-meta-data-security-schemes) like chain ID and sponsor address to the API endpoint. --- [weather-multi-value] (https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/v0.8/packages/airnode-examples/integrations/weather-multi-value) âžš - authenticated weather request [encoding multiple parameters] (./../../../../ois/v1.2/reserved-parameters.html#encoding-multiple-values) including the transaction timestamp, time of sunset, temperature, and a description of the weather. [Previous pageUsing RRP Templates] (/guides/airnode/using-rrp-templates.html)  [Next pageâ˜… Getting Started] (/guides/chainapi/)
